Description.Name: Logan Blake
Description.Details: Logan Blake, callsign "Hightail", is a skilled MechWarrior with a compelling history. Once a highly decorated officer in a Steiner Spec ops unit, he now roams as a seasoned mercenary, seeking fortune and adventure on the frontlines. Famed for his speed and agility on the battlefield and a preference for lighter mechs, Logan earned his callsign "Hightail" through his reputation for quick thinking and precise maneuvers, he excels in hit-and-run tactics, always staying a step ahead of the opposition. As a former commander, he brings strategic expertise to his mercenary unit, proving to be a valuable asset to any contract.
